title: Finding the Limit
text: What value is f(x) when $$x=3$$? If the value is undefined, write "undefined".

title: Limit Value
text: As $$x$$ approaches $$3$$, the value of f(x) does not approach any one single value, meaning that f(3) is undefined.\n##figure2.gif##
